posts.post_content:
I'm looking to purchase or trade for a few 1911 Obaks: 

Tom Hasty, Spokane, N.W.L.
William Pearce, Oakland, PC.L.

Prefer Ex or better condition without creases.

Thanks in advance,


Patrick

posts.post_title: Picked up the Tom Hasty from a boardmember
posts.post_content:
Thanks to a boardmember for selling me a Tom Hasty T212-3 1911 Obak.

I'm just looking for a William Pearce to complete my run of  1910-1911 Obak Catcher Poses.


Thanks in advance.


Patrick
